sentences.english: A crisis, down to the sea of maozedong holds double axes.
sentences.chinese: 危急关头，雄阔海双斧杀到。

sentences.english: Other-worldly chanting, to the rhythm of the rising and falling picks resonated through the hot, still air.
sentences.chinese: 闷热的空气里回荡着圣歌的旋律和镐斧起落的声音。

sentences.english: The weapons of the seated soldiers are the sword and axes;
sentences.chinese: 坐阵的兵器主要使用剑斧以备近战。

sentences.english: He chopped at me with his axe, but missed.
sentences.chinese: 他用斧向我砍来，但未砍中。

sentences.english: On Wall Street, the ax keeps falling again and again.
sentences.chinese: 在华尔街，裁员的大斧一次又一次的挥下。

sentences.english: Her comes a candle to light you to bed, Here comes a chopper to chop off your head.
sentences.chinese: 蜡烛点燃时你该上床睡觉去，当心刀斧要你的命。

sentences.english: At an additional points, cost Balin can replace his two-handed axe with Durin's Axe.
sentences.chinese: 可以支付额外费用，将巴林双手斧换成都灵之斧来用。

sentences.english: He grinds ax on the grindstone.
Improve Axe Mastery to increase basic axe damage and damage dealt by axe skills.
sentences.chinese: 强化斧专精可以提高斧基础伤害和斧技能的伤害。

sentences.english: Improve Axe Mastery to increase basic axe damage and damage dealt by axe skills.
sentences.chinese: 强化斧专精可以提高斧基础伤害和斧技能的伤害。

sentences.english: Improve Axe Mastery to increase basic axe damage and damage dealt by axe skills.
sentences.chinese: 强化斧专精可以提高斧基础伤害和斧技能的伤害。

sentences.english: Here comes a candle to light you to bed, here comes a chopper to chop off your head.
sentences.chinese: 蜡烛点燃时你该上床睡觉去，当心刀斧要你的命。

sentences.english: With a swoop of his shining axe, the first tree fell.
sentences.chinese: 手起斧落第一棵树就被砍下来。

sentences.english: Paper-cut can picture the presentation of the content lifelike delicated ghost axe god knife.
sentences.chinese: 剪纸能将画面的内容表现的活灵活现实属鬼斧神刀。

sentences.english: Plants are not falling, Pound Hammer no entry in the mountain forests.
sentences.chinese: 草木未落，斤斧不得入于山林。

sentences.english: Mounted Apachean troops riding captured horse, wielding bows and hatchets .
sentences.chinese: 阿帕奇弓骑兵骑乘缴获战马，使用战弓和短斧作战。

definition: halberd/long-handled weapon with pointed tip and crescent blade/combined spear and battle-ax
double-edged sword/CL:口[kou3],把[ba3]/classifier for blows of a sword
